short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon.fr Search Tool with Search Suggestions and additional Options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This fast and powerful search tool improves your shopping experience with helpful suggestions as you type.

Including:
- Search Suggestions (about 10 times faster than other Extensions, better results)
- Category Search (e.g., Electronics, Movies, MP3, ... only)
- Quick Domain Switch (Change the Country in seconds)
